This is a Visual Basic program so we can use VB Decompiler Lite to disassemble it. Inside the frmTrial Object of the code tab we can find â€œtxtIthinkyouhavetodisassemblethisâ€. Disassembling it and looking through the code we can find â€œHack the Hackerâ€ and â€œ(F!-4.5/(..T]â€ saved as strings. Using the first string as the username and the second as the password and then pressing the â€œActivateâ€ button will show us a success message.
